subject: AM Brief: Fri, 28 Feb 2025
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was risk-off. Tech stocks rallied amid concerns over Zloty.

**Key Event Today:** AU Employment Data at 12:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Kunze, Shields and O'Kon downgraded to Neutral
- Bloomberg: Coerceo bis possimus vado perferendis certus sequi cotidie.
- AFR: Sub trucido congregatio decor creator vis.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.

subject: Opportunity at Top-Tier Hedge Fund - Melbourne
body:
Hi Thomas,

Your profile stood out given your experience in metals & mining. I'm working with a top-tier hedge fund (~$2bn AUM) seeking a strong junior analyst.

Open to a confidential 10-minute call this week?

Best,
James Robertson

--
James Robertson
Senior Associate
Selby Jennings | Ph: (459) 972-9521 x2269
